about_the_game:
Dead On Arrival is a horror game set on trains.

In the heart of an eternal night, a seemingly endless train barrels through a desolate, otherworldly landscape. Each carriage unfolds as a unique nightmare.

As players venture deeper into the train, they encounter varying enemies: Each enemy possesses unique abilities and patterns, challenging players to adapt their strategies and equipment to survive. Inspired by outlast, you're powerless. You must work with what little you have to stay alive.

Throughout the game players collect various cassette tapes, which unveil the story behind the train and how you can escape. Players must use what htey learn to find a way out and return home.

Rogue Lite Gameplay

You will die. Learn how to survive longer with each run. Your tools are limited, you will have to use what little you have to avoid enemies, and anything else in your way

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Dead On Arrival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 processor or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760 or Superior
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: V-Sync Reccomended
